description: Telegraf dashboard intended to give you a general system overview.

targets.query: SELECT 100 - mean("usage_idle") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" = 'cpu-total' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("usage_guest") AS "guest", mean("usage_guest_nice") AS "guest_nice", mean("usage_iowait") AS "iowait", mean("usage_irq") AS "irq", mean("usage_nice") AS "nice", mean("usage_softirq") AS "softirq", mean("usage_steal") AS "steal", mean("usage_system") AS "system", mean("usage_user") AS "user" FROM "autogen"."cpu" WHERE ("cpu" = 'cpu-total' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("usage_guest")+sum("usage_guest_nice") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" != 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "cpu" fill(null)
SELECT 100 - mean("Percent_Idle_Time") FROM "win_cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("read_bytes"), 1s) AS "reads", non_negative_derivative(mean("write_bytes"), 1s) AS "writes" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND ("name" =~ /[s,v]d[a-z]$/ OR "name" =~ /:/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name" fill(none)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("reads"), 1s) AS "reads", non_negative_derivative(mean("writes"), 1s) AS "writes" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND ("name" =~ /[s,v]d[a-z]$/ OR "name" =~ /:/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name" fill(none)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("read_time"), 1s) AS "reads", non_negative_derivative(mean("write_time"), 1s) AS "writes" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND ("name" =~ /[s,v]d[a-z]$/ OR "name" =~ /:/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name" fill(none)

title: Telegraf Everything
